Codes File Loader, PUT AT END OF MAIN.DOL [YEP]
[Yacker, moester_]

	-==-


Move End of Heap [YEP]
Allows us to load code file starting at 0x817d7760
[Yacker]
Revision ---- DOL Offset ---- Hex to Replace ---------- ASM Code -
NTSC 1.00 --- 0x800063FC ---- 7FC4F378 -> 3C9EFFFE
